components.name: Card

props.description: Function that returns JSX for the card content.

props.description: Function that returns JSX for the card header.

props.name: footer
props.description: Function that returns JSX for the card footer.

components.name: DataTable
components.description: Advanced data table component with sorting, filtering, pagination, and row selection
components.author: UI Components Team

props.name: columns
props.description: Column definitions for the table using @tanstack/react-table format

props.name: data
props.description: Array of data objects to display in the table

props.name: tableLabel
props.description: Label for the table used in search placeholder and accessibility

props.name: filters
props.description: Array of filter configurations for faceted filtering. Each filter needs id and options array.

props.name: createToolbarButtons
props.description: Function that returns JSX for custom toolbar buttons. Receives (rowSelection, setRowSelection, hasSelected) params. Defaults to simple 'Add Item' button.

functionSignature.params: rowSelection: Record<string, boolean>, setRowSelection: React.Dispatch<React.SetStateAction<Record<string, boolean>>>, hasSelected: boolean

props.name: onRowClick
props.description: Optional callback when a row is clicked, receives row id

props.name: identifier
props.description: Field name to use for main search/filter functionality

props.name: initialSorting
props.description: Initial sorting state for the table

examples.name: Basic Data Table
examples.description: Simple data table with users data

examples.name: Data Table with Filters
examples.description: Data table with role and status filters

examples.name: Data Table with Sorting
examples.description: Data table with initial sorting by name

components.name: Progress
components.description: Displays an indicator showing the completion progress of a task, typically displayed as a progress bar
components.author: UI Components Team

examples.name: Animated Progress
examples.description: Progress bar that animates from 13% to 66%

examples.name: Progress with Percentage
examples.description: Progress bar at 75% with percentage display

components.name: Skeleton
components.description: Use to show a placeholder while content is loading. Provides a visual indication that content is being loaded
components.author: UI Components Team

props.name: className
props.description: Additional CSS classes for styling the skeleton shape and size

components.name: Sonner
components.description: An opinionated toast component for React. Provides elegant notifications with various types and customization options
components.author: UI Components Team

props.name: message
props.description: The main message to display in the toast

props.name: description
props.description: Additional description text for the toast

props.name: action
props.description: Action button with label and onClick handler
Your file has been moved to trash

components.name: Slider
components.description: An input where the user selects a value from within a given range. Supports single values and ranges
components.author: UI Components Team

props.name: defaultValue
props.description: The default value(s) for the slider

props.name: value
props.description: The controlled value(s) for the slider

props.name: onValueChange
props.description: Callback fired when the slider value changes

props.name: max
props.description: The maximum value for the slider

props.name: min
props.description: The minimum value for the slider

props.name: step
props.description: The step value for the slider

components.name: Switch
components.description: A control that allows the user to toggle between checked and not checked. Used for binary settings and preferences
components.author: UI Components Team

props.name: checked
props.description: The controlled checked state of the switch

props.name: onCheckedChange
props.description: Event handler called when the checked state changes

props.name: id
props.description: The id attribute for the switch element

props.name: label
props.description: Optional label text to display next to the switch

components.name: Textarea
components.description: Displays a form textarea or a component that looks like a textarea. Used for multi-line text input
components.author: UI Components Team

props.name: label
props.description: The label text for the textarea

props.name: placeholder
props.description: Placeholder text shown when textarea is empty

props.name: value
props.description: The controlled value of the textarea

props.name: onChange
props.description: Called when the textarea value changes

props.name: rows
props.description: The number of visible text lines

props.name: helperText
props.description: Helper text displayed below the textarea

props.label: Bio
props.helperText: Your bio will be displayed on your public profile.

props.label: Description
props.value: This is a sample description that demonstrates the textarea with existing content.

components.name: Toggle
components.description: A two-state button that can be either on or off. Commonly used for formatting controls and settings
components.author: UI Components Team

props.name: pressed
props.description: The controlled pressed state of the toggle

props.name: onPressedChange
props.description: Event handler called when the pressed state changes

props.name: variant
props.description: The visual variant of the toggle

props.name: children
props.description: The content to display inside the toggle

props.children: Toggle me
Bold
Italic
Outline
Large
Disabled
